mapper.sql: a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.alarm_type AS "alarmType", a.alarm_time AS "alarmTime", a.people_id AS "ccmPeople.id", a.people_name AS "ccmPeople.name", a.user_id AS "userId", a.user_name AS "userName", a.x AS "x", a.y AS "y", a.is_check AS "isCheck", a.device_id AS "ccmDevice.deviceId"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_elecfence_alarm( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, people_id, alarm_type, alarm_time, people_name, user_id, user_name, x, y, is_check, device_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{ccmPeople.id}, #{alarmType}, #{alarmTime}, #{ccmPeople.name}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{x}, #{y}, #{isCheck}, #{ccmDevice.deviceId} )
